Text: The whole movie is in english!
of course the whole movie is in english! But, are the SUBTITLES in english....ex. when someone is speaking a different language, there will be subtitles

film is good quality but the only problem is. the film is based in saudi arabia, so half the language spoken in film is arabic & the sub titles are in french, if you dont speak arabic or french it is pointless watching film... thanks all the same
